content: Hi. In the last day or so of R4 editing, can PA review the the maturity levels for Encounter (feels like it should be 3 to me), And ChargeItem/ChargeItemDefinition - these are candidates for FMM = 1?
@Brian Postlethwaite @Cooper Thompson
@Simone Heckmann , any thoughts on the chargeitem ones?
Definitely 1, we consider them complete and want to encourage implementers, to start testing...
ChargeItemDefinition is not approved by FMG so must be 0
